name: react-native-headers
description: TODO: Add long description of the pod here.
prepare_command:
proof_file=~/react-native-headers.txt
  
function debug {
  local name=$1
  eval "echo "debug: $name: $$name""
}
  
PODS_ROOT=`pwd`
RN_SRC="${PODS_ROOT}/../../node_modules/react-native/React"
RN_DEST="${PODS_ROOT}/Headers/Public/React"
  
debug "PODS_ROOT" >>"${proof_file}"
debug "RN_SRC" >>"${proof_file}"
debug "RN_DEST" >>"${proof_file}"
  
[ ! -d "${RN_SRC}" ] && exit 0
[ -d "${RN_DEST}" ] || mkdir -p "${RN_DEST}"
  
headers=`find "${RN_SRC}" -iname "*.h"`
debug "headers" >>"${proof_file}"

for hh in ${headers} ; do
  name=`basename "${hh}"`
  dest=${RN_DEST}/${name}
  [ -f "${dest}" ] && rm "${dest}"
  cp "${hh}" "${dest}"
done
